TopicTitle: Feedback: Tracking station arranging of vessels need to be more clear.

Articles.Content:
What currently happens:

-If i press 'celestial body'-icon, i can see vessels arranged to each of planet and moon.

-If i press 'vessel'-icon, i can not see vessels arranged to each of planet and moon.

 

What i expect when i click those icons:

-I would expect "celestial body" just to show them, not vessels.

-I would expect "vessel" to show vessels, arranged to their corresponding bodies.
